questions: Artificial intelligence should be regulated by governments.
Social media is doing more harm than good to society.
Voting should be mandatory in democratic countries.
Space exploration is a worthwhile investment for humanity.
Genetic engineering of human embryos should be allowed.
Nuclear energy is a viable solution to combat climate change.

Universal basic income is a good solution to address poverty.
Animal testing should be banned for all purposes.
Globalization is overall beneficial for developing countries.
